backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor state, data types, and maps for users, benches, documents, components, tags, and history, including access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing deployment and smoke‑test tasks, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Provides the production deployment checklist for Draft Version 36, including environment validation and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md: Documents required production environment variables for the frontend, including canister IDs and Internet Identity configuration.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Outlines the smoke test procedure for validating sign‑in, protected routing, and profile persistence after production deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup with separate public and protected route trees, global providers, and AppShell wrapping protected pages.
Protects admin-only content by checking admin status and showing loaders or access-denied alerts.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures a backend actor is available, showing loading or connection error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Handles authentication gating, redirecting to sign-in and showing login prompts when identity is missing.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component enabling item reordering with visual drag cues.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook managing drag-and-drop item order state and handlers.
Main application layout with navigation, user menu, theme toggle, and admin-aware links.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll-to-top and scroll-to-bottom buttons based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Single-value tag input supporting suggestions, keyboard actions, and removable selection.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid selector for picking from predefined avatar images.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays user avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache-busting and size options.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
Provides a store with a numeric cache-buster for avatar URLs and a method to refresh it.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user's selected dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence.
Periodically calls the backend to update the authenticated user's last-seen timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for benches, profiles, preferences, and related mutations.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Manages language selection, loads preference from backend or localStorage, and exposes it via context.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helpers to validate, name, and display language flags.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Lists all translation keys used throughout the app for localization.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Provides translation lookup and language control via the I18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout, applying base background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Provides the main admin interface with tabs for benches, documents, and users, using translation strings and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches with delete functionality, including confirmation dialogs and loading states.
Lists documents with metadata and provides download handling with success/error toasts and loading state.
Shows the current user profile with expiration preferences and dashboard layout info, handling loading and missing data.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Shows detailed bench info with editing, removal, component management, duplication, and history features.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays a searchable list of benches with add‑bench modal and loading/empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Implements a modal form to create a new test bench with fields, validation, uploads, tags, components, and duplication options.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Provides a table editor for adding, editing, and removing bench components with expiration status handling.
Allows uploading, listing, downloading, versioning, and deleting documents associated with a bench.
Renders a chronological list of bench history entries with user info and timestamps.
Displays a bench photo with loading and error fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Lets users manage document categories and attach files with version metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog for selecting benches and duplicating a component via mutation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details, validating fields, updating photos, and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag entry component allowing adding, removing, and selecting tag suggestions with filtering.
Displays a placeholder page for creating a new bench, showing an alert and planned feature list.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Pie chart card showing counts of components by expiration status using thresholds and i18n labels.
Bar chart comparing component expiration status per bench with dynamic thresholds and i18n.
Bar chart grouping components by expiration date ranges to show upcoming deadlines.
Pie chart summarizing documents by category with color coding and i18n labels.
Builds a bar or line chart showing component expirations grouped by month using Recharts, displaying a no‑data state when empty.
Calculates expired components per bench based on profile thresholds and renders the result as a bar or line chart.
Computes overall component health distribution and displays percentages in a gauge-like set of progress bars.
Defines a draggable, persistent list of statistic and chart cards for the dashboard’s summary section.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Assembles the main dashboard, fetching data, computing component statuses, managing section order, and rendering charts and tables.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Implements the user profile editor, including personal info, thresholds, avatar selection, language settings, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign-in page using Internet Identity with redirect on success and error display. Renders logo, login button, and helper text.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to retrieve paths and list all IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a File as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and returns the default bench placeholder image as an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Retrieves bytes from an ExternalBlob and triggers a file download in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error types into readable messages with special handling for backend traps.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold settings with localStorage fallback and computes expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique ID using timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Deterministically cleans and normalizes bench description text, fixing casing, spacing, and abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against multiple bench fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates emails, domains, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining colors, themes, plugins, animations, and content paths.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for node build tools with ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, env injection, path aliasing, dev proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for deploying Draft Version 36, including approved deployment details and smoke-test requirements. Lists existing features, no new requests, and notes profile persistence and login behavior updates.
